text: @realDonaldTrump The way FRUMPLEORANGESKIN talks on his daily briefings, suggesting ppl could use these or those remedies to treat COVID19 because they have already been tested & R safe 2 use on other illnesses so there fine 4 this? If he could promote & make money off heroin or coke? Would he?
